allow:
Bash(# Extract all parameter names with their commands
for file in /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/commands/wheels/**/*.cfc; do
    if grep -q "@.*\.hint" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then
        cmd=$(echo "$file" | sed 's|.*/commands/wheels/||' | sed 's|\.cfc$||' | sed 's|/|:|g')
        grep -E "@[a-zA-Z-]+\.hint" "$file" | sed "s/@//" | sed "s/\.hint.*//" | sed "s/^[[:space:]]*//" | sed "s/^/$cmd,/"
    fi
done | sort)

Bash(# Create a comprehensive parameter inventory
echo "# Complete Parameter Inventory" > /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli-parameter-inventory.md
echo "" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli-parameter-inventory.md
echo "## All Unique Parameters (Alphabetical)" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli-parameter-inventory.md
echo "" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli-parameter-inventory.md

# Get unique parameters
for file in /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/commands/wheels/**/*.cfc; do
    if grep -q "@.*\.hint" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then
        grep -E "@[a-zA-Z-]+\.hint" "$file" | sed "s/@//" | sed "s/\.hint.*//" | sed "s/^[[:space:]]*//"
    fi
done | sort -u | while read param; do
    echo "### $param" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli-parameter-inventory.md
    echo "Used in commands:" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli-parameter-inventory.md
    # Find which commands use this parameter
    for file in /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/commands/wheels/**/*.cfc; do
        if grep -q "@$param\.hint" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then
            cmd=$(echo "$file" | sed 's|.*/commands/wheels/||' | sed 's|\.cfc$||' | sed 's|/|:|g')
            hint=$(grep "@$param\.hint" "$file" | head -1 | sed 's/.*\.hint //' | sed 's/^[[:space:]]*//')
            echo "- \`$cmd\`: $hint" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli-parameter-inventory.md
        fi
    done
    echo "" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli-parameter-inventory.md
done

echo "Parameter inventory created!")

Bash(# Get all parameters with their usage count
echo "## Parameter Usage Summary" > /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-summary.md
echo "" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-summary.md

# Count parameter usage
for file in /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/commands/wheels/**/*.cfc; do
    if grep -q "@.*\.hint" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then
        cmd=$(echo "$file" | sed 's|.*/commands/wheels/||' | sed 's|\.cfc$||' | sed 's|/|:|g')
        grep -oE "@[a-zA-Z-]+\.hint" "$file" | sed "s/@//" | sed "s/\.hint//" | sed "s/^/$cmd:/"
    fi
done | awk -F: '{count[$2]++; commands[$2] = commands[$2] ? commands[$2] ", " $1 : $1} END {for (param in count) print count[param] " | " param " | " commands[param]}' | sort -rn | head -30)

Bash(# Extract actual parameter names more accurately
for file in /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/commands/wheels/**/*.cfc; do
    grep -oE '\* @[a-zA-Z-]+\.hint' "$file" 2>/dev/null | sed 's/\* @//' | sed 's/\.hint//'
done | sort -u | wc -l)

Bash(# Get list of unique parameters with better formatting
echo "## All Unique Parameters Used in CLI Commands" > /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md
echo "" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md
echo "Total unique parameters: 70" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md
echo "" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md

# Group parameters by category
echo "### Name/Identifier Parameters" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md
for file in /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/commands/wheels/**/*.cfc; do
    grep -oE '\* @[a-zA-Z-]+\.hint' "$file" 2>/dev/null | sed 's/\* @//' | sed 's/\.hint//'
done | sort -u | grep -E "(name|Name)" | while read p; do echo "- $p"; done >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md

echo "" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md
echo "### Type Parameters" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md
for file in /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/commands/wheels/**/*.cfc; do
    grep -oE '\* @[a-zA-Z-]+\.hint' "$file" 2>/dev/null | sed 's/\* @//' | sed 's/\.hint//'
done | sort -u | grep -iE "(type|Type)" | while read p; do echo "- $p"; done >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md

echo "" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md
echo "### Boolean Flags" >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md
for file in /Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/commands/wheels/**/*.cfc; do
    grep -oE '\* @[a-zA-Z-]+\.hint' "$file" 2>/dev/null | sed 's/\* @//' | sed 's/\.hint//'
done | sort -u | grep -vE "(name|Name|type|Type|description|format|output|path)" | while read p; do echo "- $p"; done >> /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md

cat /Users/peter/projects/wheels/parameter-list.md)
Bash(wheels scaffold Product name:string description:text price:decimal stock:integer active:boolean)
Bash(/Users/peter/projects/wheels/cli/box wheels scaffold Product name:string description:text price:decimal stock:integer active:boolean)
